frontmatter.title: url
frontmatter.meta_description: The handlebars helper for url outputs the relative url for a post. Read more about developing Ghost themes!

markdownRemark.html:
Usage: {{url}}

Description

{{url}} outputs the relative url for a post when inside the post scope.

You can force the url helper to output an absolute url by using the absolute option, E.g. {{url absolute="true"}}
